actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of oil and gas income.
short_title: Oil Industry Tax Reform Act of 1981

summary.text: Oil Industry Tax Reform Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow an income tax credit for foreign taxes paid by domestic corporations on foreign oil-related income. Treats such taxes as royalties for which a deduction or exclusion from foreign source income would be allowed. Requires the payment of income taxes at the corporate level on the foreign oil-related income of domestic corporations.

titles.title: Oil Industry Tax Reform Act of 1981
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of oil and gas income.
